text: The Sims Bustin' Out is a 2003 life simulation game released for the PlayStation 2, Xbox, Nintendo GameCube, Game Boy Advance, and N-Gage. It is part of The Sims game series. It is the second Sims game to be released on a console. == Other websites == *The Sims Bustin' Out official EA page Category:2003 video games Category:The Sims Category:Electronic Arts video games Category:Game Boy Advance games Category:Life simulation games Category:Multiplayer and single-player video games Category:N-Gage games Category:Nintendo GameCube games Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:Social simulation video games Category:Video games developed in the United States Category:Xbox games
title: The Sims Bustin' Out
